All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddSeasonalMenuItem
This class is the GUI for adding a seasonal menu item to the database.
CashPaymentWindow
This class is the GUI window for cash payment.
DatabaseConnection
This class implements a database connection for pages that require pulling information in the database.
GUI
This class implements a simple GUI for role-based login using Swing.
Main
This is the main class of the GUI application.
MenuItemSelectionPage
This class is the page that allows the user to select a menu item and customize it if necessary.
PaymentPage
This class is the payment page for the restaurant.
ReceiptPage
This class creates a window for the user to select a receipt option.
ShowCashierPage
This class represents the Cashier Page GUI where cashiers can select different drink categories, view orders, and log out.
ShowDrinkMenu
This class provides a GUI for managing the drink menu.
ShowEmployee
This class provides an interface for managing employee records.
ShowInventory
This class is used to display the inventory of the restaurant.
ShowManagerPage
This class represents the Manager Page UI in the application.
ShowOrderMenu
This calss is used to display the menu and allow the user to add items to their order.
ShowProductUsage
This class is used to display the product usage report.
ShowTrends
This class represents the Trends Report UI in the application.
ThankYouPage
This class creates a thank you page for the user after they have placed an order.
XReportGenerator
THis class generates an X-Report for the hourly sales breakdown.
ZReportGenerator
This calss generates a sales report for the current day and exports it to a CSV file.
